insert.iterate:
insert all
into out_sale_billing_d(djbh, dj_sort, spid, sl, dj, je, sl_jh, sl_lhwcl, yzid) values(#listItem[].djbh#, #listItem[].dj_sort#, #listItem[].spid#, #listItem[].sl#, #listItem[].dj#, #listItem[].je#, #listItem[].sl_jh#, #listItem[].sl#, #listItem[].yzid#)
select 1 from dual
